intro.description:
The goal of a sequence is to organise information to realise the final XML. It is namely this one which will call the transactions.
The bold text in this help file is available in (?).

item.title: Create a new sequence
item.description:
In the tab Projects view right click on your project then press on:
>New
>Sequence
>Generic sequence
>Next
>Finish

item.title: Create steps
item.description:
Multiple instructions are available in the sequences: they are steps (available in (?)).
To add a stepto a sequence right click on the sequence then press on "new" then on "Step"

item.title: Test your sequences
item.description:
To test a sequence, double click on the sequence (a new window connector view is launched).
Faites un clic droit sur la séquence puis appuyez sur "Execute".
The result is in the tab Output Tag of the browser area

item.title: add a style sheet (optional)
item.description:
You can transform your XML exit to HTML code thanks to the XSL sheet
>Put the propriaty "Style sheet" of the sequence to the value "from sequence"
> Right click on the séquence,press on "New" puis sur "Sheet" and finally on "XSL style sheet".
>In the propriaty "URL" of this sheet write a file name followed by the l'extension ".xsl"
>In the view "Project Explorer view ", right click on the directory of your project, click on "New", on "File" and name the entry in "URL".
>Then write your XSL code in the file
Le résultat sera dans l'onglet "Browser" de la Connector view
